Dakota and former Rick Santorum of Pennsylvania. Mike Pence said this was his first town hall since the Tucson, Ariz., shootings and he always consults with local law enforcement on security at such events. To me the focus is and should remain on public safety. We volunteer for these jobs, but just because someone comes to a town hall meeting, they should never have to be concerned that there's not a reasonable amount of security, he said. He said town hall meetings are "very routine" for him and said he was grateful that everyone came out Monday in the wake of the Tucson shootings.------

In a lengthy section on the administration's treatment of wartime detainees, Donald Rumsfeld regrets not leaving office in May 2004 after the disclosure of the Abu Ghraib prison scandal, writes reviewer Bradley Graham. and the Philadelphia 76ers keep winning. One night after a 41-point effort in Philadelphia's most lopsided win of the season, Allen Iverson scored an NBA season-high and career-best 54 in a 107-103 victory over the James Cleveland Cavaliers. It was like he was playing horse tonight, said 76ers guard Aaron McKie , who had 20 points and nine assists. "His jumper was deadly."
